    • Uses of OrientationStrategy in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient

      Classes in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient that implement OrientationStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DescribeOrientationWrapper
      This wrapper adds extra logging to the orientation step.
      class  GradientDescent
      The most basic type of orientation, which uses the raw function gradient.
      class  LayerReweightingStrategy
      This wrapping strategy alters the (Simple)LineCursor returned by the inner strategy to effectively tune the learning rate for each layer.
      static class  LayerReweightingStrategy.HashMapLayerReweightingStrategy
      The type Hash map layer reweighting strategy.
      class  LBFGS
      An implementation of the Limited-Memory Broyden–Fletcher–Goldfarb–Shanno algorithm https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Limited-memory_BFGS
      class  MomentumStrategy
      A simple momentum module which uses a cumulative decay algorithm to add a momentum term to any orientation strategy (if it yields a SimpleLineSearch cursor)
      class  OwlQn
      Orthant-Wise Limited-memory Quasi-Newton optimization This is a modified L-BFGS algorithm which uses orthant trust regions to bound the cursor path during the line search phase of each iteration
      class  QQN
      Quadratic Quasi-Newton optimization This method hybridizes pure gradient descent with higher-order quasinewton implementations such as L-BFGS.
      class  QuantifyOrientationWrapper
      An orientation wrapper which adds additional log statements.
      class  RecursiveSubspace
      An recursive optimization strategy which projects the current space into a reduced-dimensional subspace for a sub-optimization batch run.
      class  TrustRegionStrategy
      A generalization of the OWL-QN algorithm, this wrapping strategy projects an inner cursor to the interior of a trust region, which can be defined per-layer.
      class  ValidatingOrientationWrapper
      This strategy uses finite-difference methods to estimate a numerical derivative, and compares it with the derivative supplied by the inner's cursor.
      Fields in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.orient declared as OrientationStrategy

    • Uses of OrientationStrategy in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region

      Classes in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.region that implement OrientationStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LayerTrustRegionMap
      A concrete class of the TrustRegion orientation strategy base class, this uses a map collection to store per-layer Trust Region configurations.
